topics.body:
Hey. . . I just realized something; if schools required teaching english, spanish and chinese that would cover over a quarter of all the world and a lot of counties.

Most schools here offer dead languages like latin; they do teach spanish but other than spanish, but my school only offered spanish or latin and latin is a dead language.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/534cd25f6368727ced790400#post_534cd25f6368727ced790400

Considering that most languages draw cues from another and borrows some words. Someone with enough dedication can learn several languages just by studying the roots of each one
